targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^worker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^worker/ AND "type_instance" = 'used' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^worker/ AND "type_instance" = 'cached' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^worker/ AND "type_instance" = 'free' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "type" = 'percent' AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND "host" =~ /^worker/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "interface_rx" WHERE "instance" = 'eth0' AND "type" = 'if_octets' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /$my_host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$my_host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'user' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT mean(value) FROM "df_value" WHERE "host" =~ /$my_host$/ AND "type_instance" = 'free' AND "instance" = 'root' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
